short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to detect tab close events and notify

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser Extension to get event of tab close events so that we can hanlde the files closed from browser correctly
Chrome App mode
Windows
"c:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe" --app="https://twitter.com"
Linux
/usr/bin/google-chrome --app="https://twitter.com"
For v1.1 -> Use --app="https://twitter.com?launchedFromDfe=true"

Detecting launchedFromDfe=true for events
